recipes.title: Overnight Oats with Chia & Berries
recipes.shortDescription: Rolled oats, chia seeds, almond milk, topped with fresh berries.
steps: In a jar or container, combine oats, chia seeds, and almond milk
Add honey or maple syrup and stir well
Cover and refrigerate overnight or for at least 4 hours
In the morning, top with fresh berries and nuts if desired
Enjoy cold or at room temperature

recipes.title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
recipes.shortDescription: Whole-grain toast, smashed avocado, poached egg, chili flakes.
steps: Toast the bread until golden and crispy
Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl
Mash the avocado with a fork and season with salt and pepper
Bring a pot of water to a gentle simmer and add the vinegar
Crack each egg into a small bowl, then gently slide into the simmering water
Poach the eggs for 3-4 minutes until the whites are set but the yolks are still runny
Remove the eggs with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast and top with the poached eggs
Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with chili flakes, and serve immediately

recipes.title: Green Smoothie Bowl
recipes.shortDescription: Spinach, banana, kiwi, almond milk, topped with granola & seeds.
steps: In a blender, combine spinach, banana, kiwi, and almond milk
Blend until smooth and creamy
Pour into a bowl
Top with chia seeds, granola, sliced almonds, and a drizzle of honey if desired
Serve immediately with a spoon

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
recipes.shortDescription: Mashed banana, oats, egg, cinnamon, cooked on a non-stick pan.
ingredients: 1 tsp coconut oil or butter for cooking
steps: In a bowl, mash the banana with a fork
Add eggs and whisk until well combined
Stir in rolled oats, cinnamon, and baking powder
Let the batter rest for 5 minutes
Heat coconut oil or butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake
Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form and the edges are set
Flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden
Serve with fresh berries if desired

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.shortDescription: Yogurt layered with honey, granola, and seasonal fruits.
steps: In a glass or bowl, add a layer of Greek yogurt
Drizzle with a little honey
Add a layer of mixed berries
Sprinkle with some granola
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used
Top with chopped nuts if desired
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Vegetable Omelette
recipes.shortDescription: Eggs, spinach, mushrooms, onion, tomato, with olive oil.
steps: Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Add onion and mushrooms and saut√© for 3-4 minutes until softened
Add spinach and cook until wilted
In a bowl, whisk eggs with salt and pepper
Pour eggs over vegetables in the pan
As eggs begin to set, gently lift edges with a spatula to allow uncooked egg to flow underneath
When eggs are mostly set but still slightly runny on top, add diced tomato
Fold omelette in half and slide onto a plate
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve immediately

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
recipes.shortDescription: Protein-packed smoothie for a filling breakfast.
steps: Place all ingredients in a blender
Blend until smooth and creamy
Add more almond milk if too thick, or more ice if too thin
Pour into a glass and serve immediately

recipes.title: Whole Grain Breakfast Wrap
recipes.shortDescription: Eggs, spinach, and hummus wrapped in whole wheat tortilla.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Add spinach and cook until wilted
In a bowl, whisk eggs with salt and pepper
Add eggs to the pan with spinach and scramble until cooked
Warm the tortilla in a dry pan or microwave
Spread hummus on the tortilla
Top with scrambled eggs, spinach, and avocado slices
Roll up the tortilla, tucking in the sides as you go
Cut in half and serve immediately

recipes.title: Quinoa & Chickpea Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Protein-rich quinoa tossed with chickpeas and lemon dressing.
steps: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and parsley
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed
Serve chilled or at room temperature

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Wrap
recipes.shortDescription: Whole wheat wrap stuffed with chicken, hummus, and veggies.
steps: Warm the tortilla in a dry pan or microwave
Spread hummus evenly over the tortilla
Layer with grilled chicken, shredded carrots, cucumber, spinach, and feta cheese if using
Season with salt and pepper
Roll up the tortilla, tucking in the sides as you go
Cut in half and serve immediately

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.shortDescription: Warm, spiced soup made with lentils, carrots, and celery.
ingredients: 1 cup brown or green lentils, rinsed
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat
Add onion, carrots, and celery and saut√© for 5-7 minutes until softened
Add garlic, cumin, and turmeric and cook for another minute until fragrant
Add lentils and vegetable broth
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender
Season with salt and pepper
Stir in lemon juice
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley

recipes.title: Brown Rice Buddha Bowl
recipes.shortDescription: A colorful bowl of rice, sweet potatoes, broccoli, and tahini.
ingredients: 1 cup sweet potato, cubed and roasted
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together tahini, lemon juice, maple syrup, salt, and pepper
Add water as needed to reach desired consistency
In a bowl, arrange brown rice, sweet potato, broccoli, chickpeas, and avocado
Drizzle with tahini sauce
Sprinkle with sesame seeds
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Tuna & Avocado Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Creamy avocado mixed with tuna and fresh veggies.
steps: In a bowl, combine tuna, mashed avocado, red onion, celery, and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper and mix well
Arrange mixed greens on a plate or in a bowl
Top with tuna and avocado mixture
Drizzle with olive oil
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Whole Wheat Veggie Sandwich
recipes.shortDescription: Cucumber, tomato, spinach, and hummus in hearty bread.
steps: Toast the bread if desired
Spread hummus on both slices of bread
Layer cucumber, tomato, spinach, and red onion on one slice
Season with salt and pepper
Top with the second slice of bread
Cut in half and serve immediately

recipes.title: Mediterranean Couscous Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Couscous with cucumber, tomato, olives, and feta
ingredients: 1/4 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
steps: In a large bowl, combine couscous, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, red onion, and parsley
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine
Gently fold in feta cheese
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed
Serve chilled or at room temperature

recipes.title: Sweet Potato & Black Bean Bowl
recipes.shortDescription: A high-fiber, filling bowl with a spicy kick.
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato, cubed and roasted
1/2 cup black beans, rinsed and drained
1 tbsp Greek yogurt or sour cream
steps: In a bowl, combine sweet potato, black beans, corn, and avocado
In a small bowl, mix together salsa, Greek yogurt, lime juice, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper
Drizzle the sauce over the sweet potato mixture
Toss gently to combine
Garnish with fresh cilantro
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Veggies
recipes.shortDescription: Salmon baked with garlic, lemon, and roasted broccoli.
steps: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
Arrange broccoli florets around the salmon
Drizzle olive oil over salmon and broccoli
Sprinkle with minced garlic, dried dill, salt, and pepper
Top salmon with lemon slices
Bake for 15-20 minutes until salmon is cooked through and broccoli is tender
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
recipes.shortDescription: Crisp veggies and tofu tossed in sesame soy sauce.
ingredients: 1 block firm tofu, pressed and cubed
2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat
Add tofu and cook until golden on all sides, then remove from pan
Add garlic and ginger and stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until crisp-tender
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water
Return tofu to the pan and pour sauce over vegetables and tofu
Cook for another 2 minutes until sauce thickens
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve immediately

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.shortDescription: Peppers filled with rice, beans, and fresh herbs.
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, tops removed and seeds removed
1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
steps: Preheat oven to 375¬∞F (190¬∞C)
In a bowl, combine rice, black beans, corn, onion, garlic, cumin, chili powder, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper
Fill each bell pepper with the rice mixture
Place peppers in a baking dish and add a small amount of water to the bottom of the dish
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes
Remove foil, sprinkle with cheese if using, and bake for another 10-15 minutes until peppers are tender
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken with Quinoa
recipes.shortDescription: Juicy chicken paired with quinoa and saut√©ed spinach
ingredients: 1 tsp dried herbs (thyme, rosemary, or oregano)
steps: Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and dried herbs
Heat olive oil in a grill pan or skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken for 6-8 minutes per side until cooked through
Remove chicken from pan and let rest
In the same pan, add garlic and spinach and saut√© until spinach is wilted
Stir in lemon juice
Serve chicken with quinoa and saut√©ed spinach

recipes.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
recipes.shortDescription: Low-carb zucchini noodles tossed with basil pesto.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add zucchini noodles and saut√© for 2-3 minutes until just tender
Add cherry tomatoes and cook for another minute
Remove from heat and toss with basil pesto
Season with salt and pepper
Top with toasted pine nuts, parmesan cheese, and fresh basil
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Chickpea & Spinach Curry
recipes.shortDescription: Creamy coconut curry with chickpeas and spinach.
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add onion and saut√© until softened
Add garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, and cayenne pepper and cook for another minute
Add chickpeas and coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Season with salt
Serve over rice and garnish with fresh cilantro

recipes.title: Turkey Meatballs with Spaghetti
recipes.shortDescription: Lean turkey meatballs served over whole-wheat pasta.
steps: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
In a bowl, combine ground turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, garlic, parsley, oregano, salt, and pepper
Form into meatballs and place on a baking sheet
Bake for 20-25 minutes until cooked through
In a pan, heat marinara sauce
Add meatballs to sauce and simmer for 5 minutes
Serve meatballs and sauce over spaghetti
Top with parmesan cheese

recipes.title: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.shortDescription: Lighter baked version of the Italian classic.
steps: Preheat oven to 375¬∞F (190¬∞C)
Arrange eggplant slices on a baking sheet and sprinkle with salt
Let sit for 20 minutes, then pat dry
In a shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese
Dip each eggplant slice in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumb mixture
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook eggplant slices for 2-3 minutes per side until golden
In a baking dish, spread a layer of marinara sauce
Arrange a layer of eggplant slices over sauce
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese
Repeat layers, ending with sauce and mozzarella
Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden
Garnish with fresh basil and serve immediately

recipes.title: Energy Balls
recipes.shortDescription: Bite-sized snacks made with oats, dates, and peanut butter.
ingredients: 1/3 cup mini chocolate chips or cacao nibs
steps: In a food processor, combine oats and dates and pulse until finely chopped
Add peanut butter, honey or maple syrup, vanilla extract, and process until well combined
Transfer to a bowl and stir in chocolate chips or cacao nibs and chopped nuts or seeds
If using, place shredded coconut in a shallow dish
Roll mixture into 1-inch balls
Optional: roll balls in shredded coconut
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks

recipes.title: Chia Pudding
recipes.shortDescription: Chia seeds soaked in almond milk, topped with fruit.
ingredients: 1 cup almond milk (or any milk of choice)
1/2 cup mixed berries or sliced fruit
steps: In a jar or container, combine chia seeds, almond milk, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract
Stir well until fully combined
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight
Stir again before serving to break up any clumps
Top with mixed berries or sliced fruit and chopped nuts or seeds
Serve chilled

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Fruit Dip
recipes.shortDescription: Yogurt sweetened with honey, served with apple slices.
steps: In a small bowl, combine Greek yogurt, honey, vanilla extract, and cinnamon
Stir until smooth and well combined
Transfer to a serving dish
Arrange apple slices and mixed berries on a plate
Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve

recipes.title: Roasted Chickpeas
recipes.shortDescription: Crispy, spiced chickpeas baked to perfection.
steps: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
Pat chickpeas very dry with paper towels
In a bowl, combine chickpeas, olive oil, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and cayenne pepper
Toss to coat evenly
Spread chickpeas in a single layer on a baking sheet
Roast for 20-30 minutes, shaking the pan occasionally, until crispy
Let cool completely before serving
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 days

recipes.title: Apple Nachos
recipes.shortDescription: Apple slices drizzled with peanut butter and dark chocolate.
steps: Arrange apple slices on a plate in a single layer
In a small microwave-safe bowl, melt peanut butter for 15-20 seconds until drizzling consistency
Drizzle peanut butter over apple slices
In the same bowl, melt dark chocolate chips for 20-30 seconds, stirring until smooth
Drizzle chocolate over apple slices
Sprinkle with shredded coconut and chopped nuts
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Frozen Yogurt Bark
recipes.shortDescription: Yogurt topped with berries and nuts, frozen into a crunchy treat.
steps: In a bowl, combine Greek yogurt, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract
Stir until well combined
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Spread yogurt mixture in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet
Sprinkle with mixed berries, chopped nuts or seeds, and shredded coconut if using
Freeze for at least 3 hours or until firm
Break into pieces and serve immediately
Store in an airtight container in the freezer for up to 1 month

recipes.title: Dark Chocolate Strawberries
recipes.shortDescription: Juicy strawberries dipped in antioxidant-rich dark chocolate.
ingredients: 1 tbsp chopped nuts or shredded coconut (optional)
steps: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
In a microwave-safe bowl, combine dark chocolate chips and coconut oil
Microwave for 30 seconds, then stir
Continue microwaving in 15-second intervals, stirring between each, until chocolate is smooth
Holding each strawberry by the stem, dip into chocolate, coating about two-thirds of the berry
Allow excess chocolate to drip off
Place on prepared baking sheet
If using, sprinkle with chopped nuts or shredded coconut
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes until chocolate is set
Serve chilled or at room temperature

recipes.title: Healthy Oatmeal Cookies
recipes.shortDescription: Soft cookies made with oats, honey, and banana.
ingredients: 1/4 cup dark chocolate chips or raisins
steps: Preheat oven to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
In a bowl, combine mashed bananas, honey or maple syrup, coconut oil, egg, and vanilla extract
In another bowl, whisk together rolled oats, whole wheat flour, baking soda, and cinnamon
Add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and stir until just combined
Fold in dark chocolate chips or raisins
Drop tablespoon-sized balls of dough onto prepared baking sheet
Flatten slightly with the back of a spoon
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely

recipes.title: Egg Muffins
recipes.shortDescription: Mini baked omelettes packed with veggies and protein.
ingredients: 1 cup chopped vegetables (bell peppers, spinach, onions, mushrooms)
steps: Preheat oven to 375¬∞F (190¬∞C)
Grease a muffin tin well
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, pepper, and dried herbs if using
Stir in chopped vegetables and cheese
Pour egg mixture into muffin cups, filling each about three-quarters full
Bake for 18-20 minutes until set and lightly golden
Let cool for 5 minutes before removing from tin
Serve warm or refrigerate for up to 4 days

recipes.title: Tuna Salad with Avocado
recipes.shortDescription: Tuna mixed with avocado and lemon for a creamy protein boost.
ingredients: Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving
steps: In a bowl, combine tuna, mashed avocado, and lemon juice
Add celery and red onion and mix well
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve in lettuce leaves for a low-carb option or on whole grain bread
Can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 days

recipes.title: Grilled Turkey Burgers
recipes.shortDescription: Juicy lean turkey patties wrapped in lettuce.
steps: In a bowl, combine ground turkey, egg, breadcrumbs, onion, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper
Mix gently until just combined
Form into 4 patties
Heat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat
Cook patties for 5-6 minutes per side until cooked through
Serve in lettuce leaves with tomato and avocado slices

recipes.title: Protein Smoothie
recipes.shortDescription: Banana, protein powder, and nut butter blended into a shake.
ingredients: 1 tbsp almond butter or peanut butter
1 cup almond milk or milk of choice
1 tbsp chia seeds or flax seeds (optional)
steps: Place all ingredients in a blender
Blend until smooth and creamy
Add more milk if too thick, or more ice if too thin
Pour into a glass and serve immediately

recipes.title: Chicken & Vegetable Skewers
recipes.shortDescription: Grilled skewers loaded with chicken and colorful veggies.
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
steps: In a bowl, combine chicken, olive oil, garlic, oregano, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Toss to coat and marinate for at least 30 minutes
Thread chicken and vegetables onto skewers, alternating between chicken and vegetables
Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat
Grill skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple
recipes.shortDescription: Creamy cottage cheese topped with fresh pineapple chunks.
steps: Place cottage cheese in a bowl
Top with fresh pineapple chunks
Sprinkle with chopped nuts if using
Drizzle with honey or maple syrup if desired
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Garlic
recipes.shortDescription: Oven-baked salmon seasoned with garlic and herbs.
ingredients: 1 tsp dried herbs (thyme, rosemary, or dill)
steps: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
In a small bowl, combine olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, dried herbs, salt, and pepper
Drizzle mixture over salmon fillets
Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon is cooked through
Serve with lemon wedges

recipes.title: Black Bean & Quinoa Bowl
recipes.shortDescription: High-fiber and protein-packed plant-based power bowl.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
steps: In a bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, corn, red onion, and bell pepper
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, cumin, salt, and pepper
Drizzle dressing over quinoa mixture and toss to combine
Top with avocado slices
Garnish with fresh cilantro
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
recipes.shortDescription: Stir-fried tofu and veggies in sesame soy sauce.
ingredients: 1 block firm tofu, pressed and cubed
2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat
Add tofu and cook until golden on all sides, then remove from pan
Add garlic and ginger and stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until crisp-tender
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water
Return tofu to the pan and pour sauce over vegetables and tofu
Cook for another 2 minutes until sauce thickens
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve immediately

recipes.title: Lentil & Spinach Curry
recipes.shortDescription: Hearty lentil curry simmered with coconut milk and spinach.
ingredients: 1 cup brown or green lentils, rinsed
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add onion and saut√© until softened
Add garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, and cayenne pepper and cook for another minute
Add lentils, coconut milk, and 2 cups water
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Season with salt
Serve over rice and garnish with fresh cilantro

recipes.title: Chickpea & Avocado Salad
recipes.shortDescription: A refreshing salad with creamy avocado and chickpeas
steps: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, avocado, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and parsley
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
recipes.shortDescription: Sweet potatoes filled with beans, corn, and salsa.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
1/4 cup Greek yogurt or sour cream
steps: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)
Pierce sweet potatoes several times with a fork
Bake for 45-60 minutes until tender
In a bowl, combine black beans, corn, salsa, salt, and pepper
When sweet potatoes are cool enough to handle, slice them open lengthwise
Fluff the flesh with a fork
Divide bean mixture among sweet potatoes
Top with Greek yogurt or sour cream, avocado, and cheese if using
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately

recipes.title: Caprese Zoodles
recipes.shortDescription: Zucchini noodles with mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: In a large bowl, combine zucchini noodles, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper
Drizzle dressing over zoodle mixture and toss gently to combine
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.shortDescription: A hearty mix of beans, corn, and bell peppers.
ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
Toppings: avocado, sour cream, cheese, cilantro
steps: In a large pot, saut√© onion and bell pepper until softened
Add garlic and cook for another minute
Add chili powder, cumin, and oregano and stir to coat vegetables
Add all beans, diced tomatoes, and corn
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with desired toppings

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.shortDescription: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms and veggie broth
steps: In a saucepan, heat vegetable broth and keep warm
In a large pan, melt 1 tbsp butter over medium heat
Add mushrooms and cook until golden, then remove from pan
In the same pan, melt remaining butter
Add onion and cook until softened
Add garlic and cook for another minute
Add rice and stir to coat with butter
If using, add wine and cook until absorbed
Add warm broth, one ladle at a time, stirring frequently and waiting until liquid is absorbed before adding more
Continue until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes
Stir in cooked mushrooms, parmesan cheese, and parsley
Season with salt and pepper
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Grilled Veggie Wrap
recipes.shortDescription: Roasted vegetables wrapped with hummus in a tortilla.
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, eggplant), sliced and grilled
steps: Warm the tortilla in a dry pan or microwave
Spread hummus evenly over the tortilla
Layer with grilled vegetables, spinach, feta cheese if using, and olives if using
Roll up the tortilla, tucking in the sides as you go
Cut in half and serve immediately
